gameDetails.name: Dungeon Roll: Hero Booster Pack #1
gameDetails.description: Dungeon Roll: Hero Booster Pack #1 is a set of eight extra heroes, each with its own special and ultimate powers, for use with Dungeon Roll. The heroes included in this pack are the Alchemist, Scout, Undead Viking, Leprechaun, Dwarf Berserker, Elf Tracker, Treasure Hunter, and Sorceress.
